m_szDocTitle: Car Sharing Startup Local Motion Gets $6 Million Investment, Steven Sinofsky On Its Board - Business Insider
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Local Motion Steven Sinofsky is joining the board of car sharing technology   startup Local Motion.  Venture capital firm Andreessen Horowitz (AH) is investing $6   million in Local Motion. Sinofsky recently joined Andreessen Horowitz .  We spoke with Local Motion co-founder Clement Gires about his   company, and Sinofsky.  Gires and his co-founder John Stanfield were building their own   electric car at Stanford.
